page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: A rural part of East Sussex with large areas of intensively managed grassland,scattered areas of woodland and rough grazing land.Horam is the main residential and shopping area.The Merrydown Cider Factory is to be found here and is a major source of employment. Some still work on the land in fencing,farming and in nurseries, but many travel to larger towns for employment.Public transport is limited and nearly every family rely on owning a car.The primary school for the area is to be found at Maynards Green.There is a lack of commercial entertainment but this is compensated by a number of voluntary organisations e.g.Scouts,Guides,Ramblers,Youth Club.
